citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:25 PM to
2:15 PM on 03/09/2015. Attempts to reach licensee by phone were unsuccessful.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:25 PM to
2:15 PM on 03/09/2015. Attempts to reach licensee by phone were unsuccessful.
